price: 226. Kuwa ka dhaarta xaasaskooda (in muddo ah inaysan u galmooneyn), waxaa la sugayaa afar bilood58, Hadday ka soo noqdaan (Muddadaa ka hor), hubaal Alle waa Denbi Dhaaf Badane, Naxariis Badan.
arabic: لِّلَّذِينَ يُؤۡلُونَ مِن نِّسَآئِهِمۡ تَرَبُّصُ أَرۡبَعَةِ أَشۡهُرٖۖ فَإِن فَآءُو فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ
footnotes: 58. Markay dhammaato muddada afarta bilood ah uu ka dhaartay xaaskiisa, waa in la joojiyo ilaa uu ka furo. Mana dhacayo furriinka jeer uu furo.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: lilladhīna yu'lūna min nisāihim tarabbuṣu arbaʿati ashhurin fa-in fāū fa-inna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
